caption.title: SCARB2 is necessary for effective infection by EV71-VP1 97R167G and EV71-VP1 97L167E.
caption.p: A) Mean (N = 2) viral titers (±SEM) expressed as log TCID 50/ml (median tissue culture infective dose) obtained 5 dpi in cells expressing (control) or not (ΔSCARB2) SCARB2. Wells with less than 50 infected cells were considered as negative. B) Western blot showing SCARB2 expression in ΔSCARB2 cells and control cells. ****P<0.0001, **P<0.01, *P<0.05.
